content.title: Mukhyamantri Yuva Swarojgar Yojana
content.details: Chief Minister Youth Self-Employment Scheme CG MMYSY Yojana 2023 has been started by the state government to make the youth of Chhattisgarh self-employed and economically independent. The scheme provides overall assistance like financial assistance, guarantee, training, and follow-up to the youth in setting up industry service and business as self-employment.
eligibility: The applicant should be a native of Chhattisgarh state.
Applicant must have passed minimum 8th class.
The age of the applicant should be between 18 to 35 years as of the date of application.
The applicant should not be a defaulter of any nationalized bank / financial institution / cooperative bank.
Only one person from a family will be able to apply.
The annual income of the applicant's family is Rs. 3,00,000/-.
Applicants who have taken benefit of grant under PMRYO, PMROSRIKA or any other scheme of the Government of India / State Government will not be eligible.
content.application_process: Offline. Applicants can get the application form from the department office and submit it to the District Trade and Industry Center along with necessary supporting documents.

faqs.question: What is Mukhyamantri Yuva Swarojgar Yojana?
faqs.answer: Chief Minister Youth Self-Employment Scheme has been started by the state government to make the youth of the state economically independent and self-reliant by establishing self-enterprises.

faqs.question: What are the benefits under the scheme?
May Other State person also apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only from Chhattisgarh native persons.

faqs.question: What is the minimum educational qualification required for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must have passed minimum 8th class.

faqs.question: What will be the age criteria?
faqs.answer: The age of the applicant should be between 18 to 35 years as of the date of application.

faqs.question: Is there any age relaxation for some categories?
faqs.answer: 5 years relaxation in maximum age limit for SC/ST/OBC/Women/PWD entrepreneurs/Naxalite affected family members/Retired soldiers.

faqs.question: How many Facility members can get the benefits from this scheme?
faqs.answer: Only one person from a family.

faqs.question: What will be income criteria as Eligibility?
faqs.answer: The annual income of the applicant's family is Rs. 3,00,000/-.

faqs.question: What documents are required while submitting the application?
faqs.answer: Aadhar card, Permanent Residential Certificate, Caste certificate, Educational qualification document, Bank account, Passport-size photo, Mobile no.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: The application in the prescribed format will be submitted by the applicant to the District Trade and Industry Center along with necessary supporting documents.
